artist: Artist: Attributed to Carlo Marchionni or; Artist: Attributed to Pier Leone Ghezzi
description: recto: man seen from back, wearing a coat with large pockets and stitching on slit at back; man holds papers with text in PR hand; legs of stool visible beneath coat hem; verso: fantastic columnar architectural element with cartouche, swags and foliate scrolls, face and animal legs
inscription:
Inscription

LLC, in brown: [delcorvalier (?) Ghezzi]; on back, in pencil: [BBS]
medium: Pen and brown ink with wash over black chalk
provenance: [Pietro Scarpa, Venice, until 1971; sold July 10, for 210,000 lire, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (by 1971-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Man Seated at a Draftsman's Table
